org.openimaj.audio.generation

Class PolyphonicSynthesizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.Audio
      • org.openimaj.audio.AudioStream
        • org.openimaj.audio.AudioMixer
          • org.openimaj.audio.generation.PolyphonicSynthesizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SampleChunk>, Instrument

    public class PolyphonicSynthesizer
extends AudioMixer
implements Instrument
    A class that uses a pool of synthesizers for creating a polyphonic synthesizer.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
